title: 820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
message:
I can boot with this usb-c port fine w/out a battery. this port can see USB-c drive fine but doesn't charge and macOS can see the charger but it says "not charging"
I think it's either u3200 or u7000.

usb-c meter say 19,72v at 0.275a which is the same as the other port.

title: 820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
message:
I doubt to be U7000 issue, if battery is charging from U3100 side.

Any history fault?

title: 820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
message: liquid but all area looks clean. my next guess will be smc.

title: 820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
message:
Is the battery charging on the other port?
In such case, can't be a problem with a common component...

title: 820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
message: i've give u3200 a swap then report back.

title: 820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
message: fixed... never mind. it's then usb-c cable. still not sure why it's working on another port but not on this port. after changing usb-c cable and this port work. so strange...

title: 820-00875 closest usb-c port is not charging.
message: Be sure the terminal contacts are good on both USB-C ports.
